recipe_name: Mushrooms with creamy mustard on fried bread
author: James Martin
method: Heat the oil in a small frying pan over a medium heat. Sprinkle the bread with the chopped and then fry on both sides for 1-2 minutes. Remove the fried bread from the pan and keep warm. Add the onion, extra oil and mushrooms to the pan and fry over a high heat for three minutes. Stir through the mustard, white wine and double cream and season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper. Leave to simmer on a low heat until the mixture thickens. To serve, place the fried bread onto a serving plate and spoon over the creamy mushroom mixture.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 thick slice bread,  2 tbsp chopped parsley,  ½ onion,finely chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 large mushroom, chopped,  ½ tsp wholegrain mustard,  splash white wine,  splash double cream
